answers.answer: Are you getting an epidural or all natural

I'm a first time mom and won't be delivering till July. ...I'm already scared! I think it's completely natural and would wonder what kind of person isn't scared of labor!  I have been told that it'll hurt like hell but the second you hold your baby for the first time it's all worth it.  Women are strong...We're made for this. You can do it!!!

I'm pregnant with my fourth and I get scared everytime but once your in labor it's kind of just natural to know how to deal with the pain, getting my back rubbed helped me allot until I got the epidural and then I was fine

Just like @marisacarrisalez said getting rubbed helps a lot :) and once youre baby is born you feel no pain anymore :) its really and awesome experience its just scary because you wait so long to get there

Oh I know how u feel....am due mar 15 and counting down is exciting and scary at the same time. My pregnancy is not that hard except dealing with gestational diabetes n tired all the time ....ughhh thinking about delivery is nurve rocking ...anyways good luck to you my dear.

question: So my due date is February 8th..ill be 38 weeks sunday. And as everyday gets closer...Im soooo very scared of delivering my son. Ive had a good pregnany with no problems but im just so terrified of how ill handle all the pain ill be in :( Im scared and idk how to handle it. Did anyone get scared?? If so..how did you handle it when you actually gave birth?
title: scared..
